quote: I will do anything. Anything, Blaire, just to be near you. I can’t think about anything else. I can’t focus on anything. So never think you’re inconveniencing me. You need me, I’m there.
quote_letters: I WILL DO ANYTHING ANYTHING BLAIRE JUST TO BE NEAR YOU I CANT THINK ABOUT ANYTHING ELSE I CANT FOCUS ON ANYTHING SO NEVER THINK YOURE INCONVENIENCING ME YOU NEED ME IM THERE
